title: LEAGUE PLAYERS ARE TO SERIOUS
body:
I literally made this account to troll and have fun, 
but no matter what there are people that ARE SO SERIOUS ABOUT THIS DAMN GAME IT'S ANNOYING, here is the funny part i have NEVER SEEN THEM AT TOURNAMENTS EVER!!!! cause I use to do tournaments all the time back when i wanted to get good and improve my play 

now I don't give a fuck and i run into try hard's all the damn time

my advice if you are really trying to get good at league join tournaments and record your play you will get better
also fuck elo it doesn't mean shit speaking from experience 
but if elo is that important to you 

THAN GET A LIFE

and what i mean by troll is i run weird builds and play champs that having nothing to do with the composition i basically play whatever i want 

no im not going online and harassing people

It's the same thing. There is no compromise in his actions. Hes playing the game for his reasons and his reasons alone no matter what the circumstance or no matter whos experience it impedes on. Having no regard for your other teammates that may have not or would not have done anything to deserve such insubordination, ya know?

And thats not a bad thing to have a way you want to do things, not at all what im saying. But its a horrible thing when the person believes they have a divine given right to impose their actions over other people and need to exercise it no matter what or who because they can.

And then their are people that try to wight night such behavior as "Being relaxed, havin fun, bein chill bro shouldn't matter what other people think or wanna do man cuz it aint that serious bro. calm down" I am a relaxed person, im amicable and i love to have fun. And then i know what i do and dont tolerate, one of which being insubordination. I play to actually try to win, and ill accept the loss with no problem "Oh well we did our best move on" That is what i play for. Someone on the team that plays for a different reason does not supersede the way we all should play.
